update_title: A new update for this app is available.
update_message: Update this app because this version has some issues.

items.title: AKI HAYAKAWA or FOX DEVIL
items.text:
1.Download the AKI HAYAKAWA or FOX DEVIL mod from the provided description or link.

2.Open a file explorer app, such as ES File Explorer or Andro Zip, on your device.
items.text_2:
3. se the file explorer to extract the mod (file with the .melmod suffix).

4.Add the mod file to the Android version of Melon Playground by placing it in the specified folder.:
